# Office Furniture Categories 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6 - Dartmouth, NS, 17th Floor
## Solicitation Information
### Reference Number: PW-22-01009527
### Amendment Number: 2
### Solicitation Number: 5000068691
### Publication Date: October 7, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: October 27, 2022, 14:00:00
### Amendment Date: October 24, 2022

## Procurement Details
This solicitation is issued pursuant toPWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Categories:
* Product Category 1: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Product Category 2: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
* Product Category 3: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Product Category 5: Ancillary and Lighting Products
* Product Category 6: Support Space – Collaborative Furniture
This requirement also includes products that are not part of the Supply Arrangement.

## Trade Agreements and Procurement Category
This solicitation falls under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
